examples.en: I'm on days this week.
examples.ru: Я на этой неделе работаю в день.

examples.en: His days are numbered.
The days passed slowly.
April has 30 days.
He saw better days.
He left two days ago.
Eight days intervened.
The days are shortening.
He has known better days.
He hadn't shaved for days.
His dancing days are done.
The days slowly crawled by.
He ended his days in prison.
examples.ru: Он закончил свои дни /свою жизнь/ в тюрьме.

examples.en: In winter, the days shorten.
I need to structure my days.
Kids grow up fast these days.
examples.ru: В наше время дети растут быстро.

examples.en: In Spring, the days lengthen.
Her hat had seen better days.
examples.ru: Её шляпка знавала и лучшие дни.

examples.en: That style is out these days.
examples.ru: В наше время данный стиль уже устарел.

examples.en: We spent three days in Paris.
examples.ru: Мы провели три дня в Париже.

examples.en: He had a pass for three days.
These days it is not unusual.
examples.ru: В наши дни это не редкость.

examples.en: He spent his days in beggary.
examples.ru: Он провёл свои дни в нищете.

examples.en: She ended her days in poverty.
examples.ru: Она закончила свои дни в бедности.

examples.en: Money was short in those days.
The sun sets early these days.
Men may sail it in seven days.
examples.ru: За семь дней это можно переплыть.

examples.en: The brief days flit ghostlike.
Days of happy commune are dead.
He wrote back three days later.
examples.ru: Он написал в ответ три дня спустя.
